mapper.select: SELECT a.assortCode, w.laydownGoodsName, w.laydownGoodsCount, c.contractorName, t.largeCategory, t.mediumCategory, t.smallCategory, a.productFrequency, a.locationCode, a.memberId, a.sortingDate FROM k3_tb_assort_goods AS a INNER JOIN k3_tb_warehousing AS w ON a.warehousingCode = w.warehousingCode INNER JOIN k3_tb_contractor_staff AS c on a.contractorId = c.contractorId INNER JOIN k3_tb_total_category AS t on a.categoryCode = t.categoryCode;

SELECT w.laydownCheckCode, w.mainBusinessCode, w.laydownGoodsName, w.laydownGoodsCount, w.manufacturedDate, w.expiratonDate, c.contractorName, w.laydownDate, m.memberName, w.laydownCheckDate, w.laydownCheckResult FROM k3_tb_warehousing AS w INNER JOIN k3_tb_contractor_staff AS c on w.contractorId = c.contractorId INNER JOIN k3_tb_member AS m ON w.laydownCheckManager = m.memberId
